text:
Word Problems with trigonometry and triangles

0\n0\n"O From the point of three hundred feet tall building the angle of elevation to the base of the antena on the roof is\n[imath] 26.6^{\circ} . [/imath] The angle of elevation to the\n10 top of antena is [imath] 31.5^{\circ} [/imath]. Determine the height of antena.
